name: BlockPuz - Block Puzzles Games
description:
It's time to relax your brain! "BlockPuz" is an innovative jigsaw puzzle game designed and updated continuously for true lovers of brainstorming! Drag different block fragments to the appropriate position to match the given pattern. Sounds simple? The game has two puzzle gameplay: "BlockPuz" and "SudoCube". The blocks cannot be rotated, and the difficulty of the game increases step by step. There is only one solution for each level. Are you ready for the block challenge?

Drag the block fragments at the bottom of the interface to find a suitable position in the given pattern to place the block fragments until the pattern is filled up correctly. Each square is a unique design, allowing you to get a unique puzzle experience. With thousands of levels and exquisite patterns, welcome to the world of fantastic puzzles!

A few minutes a day, easily improve your brain power! Download our game and compare with your friends whose score is higher!
